definitions.definition: A person who owns or runs a smallholding (small farm ): a minor independent farmer .
A small slaveholder : a person who owns a smallholding (small plantation with slavery).

main_definition: A person who owns or runs a smallholding (small farm ): a minor independent farmer .
secondary_definitions: ( US , historical ) A small slaveholder : a person who owns a smallholding (small plantation with slavery).
